masterdata.name: Attribute Master
masterdata.description: List of Attributes

masterdata.name: Channel master
masterdata.description: This indicates the various sales channels available for a product

masterdata.name: City Master
masterdata.description: List of Cities

masterdata.name: Copay Payout Type Master
masterdata.description: List of different Copay Payout Types in AMHI

masterdata.name: Cost Sharing Master
masterdata.description: This Master will store the different types Cost sharing options which could be used during product /coverage setup in AMHI. For e.g. Copay, Deductible and Franchise

masterdata.name: Coverage master
masterdata.description: This master will hold the list of coverages offered by AMHI

masterdata.name: Coverage Type Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types in which a Coverage can be categorized.

masterdata.name: Currency Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types of currencies used in transactions.

masterdata.name: DateType Master
masterdata.description: This Master will hold the different types dates which could be used during setting up the Coverage Incidence

masterdata.name: Deductible Payout Type master
masterdata.description: List of different Deductible Payout Types in AMHI

masterdata.name: Duration Master
masterdata.description: This Master will hold the different types of durations used within AMHI - Year, Months, Weeks, Days, Hours, Minutes etc

masterdata.name: Grid Broken Bones
masterdata.description: Master to determine percentage of SI given to the insured in case of a broken bone(s)

masterdata.name: Grid Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types of Grids available in AMHI

masterdata.name: Grid PPD
masterdata.description: Master to determine percentage of SI given to the insured in case of a permanent partial disablement

masterdata.name: Grid PTD
masterdata.description: Master to determine percentage of SI given to the insured in case of a permanent total disablement

masterdata.name: ICD Group master
masterdata.description: This will contain the grouping of ICD-10 codes

masterdata.name: ICD master
masterdata.description: This will contain the list of all ICD-10 codes

masterdata.name: Incidence Master
masterdata.description: This Master will hold the different types of Incidence which could occur, reported, prevailed during the Product setup and will be used for Claim processing

masterdata.name: LOB Master
masterdata.description: This master will store the relevant LOB present in AMHI. E.g., Health, Travel, PA.

masterdata.name: Network Type Lookup
masterdata.description: List of Network Types

masterdata.name: Payout Cap Type Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types of cap for a Payout

masterdata.name: Payout Freq Type Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types of frequency by which a Payout can be made for a Coverage

masterdata.name: Payout Method Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types in which a Payout can be made for a Coverage

masterdata.name: Payout Trigger Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types of triggers that can lead to a Claim or Payout

masterdata.name: Pincode Master
masterdata.description: List of all Pincodes

masterdata.name: Plan option master
masterdata.description: Store the relevant plan options present in AMHI. E.g., Individual, Family/Floater

masterdata.name: Plan variant master
masterdata.description: Store the relevant plan variants present in AMHI. E.g., Standard, Exclusive, Premium; Gold, Silver, Bronze etc.

masterdata.name: Procedure Group master
masterdata.description: This will contain a grouping of Procedure codes

masterdata.name: Procedure master
masterdata.description: This will contain the list of all Procedure codes

masterdata.name: Product Rider Mapping
masterdata.description: Master to create the mapping between a Base Product and the Rider

masterdata.name: Product Segment Master
masterdata.description: Master to capture all product segments

masterdata.name: Reasons master
masterdata.description: This will contain a list of reasons used with the manual/system workflows.

masterdata.name: Relationship Master
masterdata.description: This will include the Relationship codes used in CARE

masterdata.name: Rider Master
masterdata.description: This will contain the list of Riders available in CARE

masterdata.name: Room Type master
masterdata.description: List of different room types/categories in AMHI

masterdata.name: Services Master
masterdata.description: Stores the available services in AMHI that will be offered under a coverage

masterdata.name: Sub channel master
masterdata.description: This indicates the various sub-channels available for a product

masterdata.name: Sublimit Type Master
masterdata.description: This will include the various types of Sublimits that can be applied.

masterdata.name: Zone master
masterdata.description: List of Zones

masterdata.name: State
masterdata.description: Includes the states

masterdata.name: Taluka/ District
masterdata.description: Includes the district/talukas inside a state

masterdata.name: City/Village
masterdata.description: Includes the city/village inside a district/taluka

masterdata.name: Ownership type
masterdata.description: Includes the type of ownerships possible for provider enterprise (eg. Partnership)

masterdata.name: Recognized by
masterdata.description: Includes the recognition organizations (eg. ICRA)

masterdata.name: Major Services Available
masterdata.description: Includes the major servies offered by the provider (eg. IP)

masterdata.name: IP services
masterdata.description: Includes the servies offered inside the IP by the provider (eg. Single speciality)

masterdata.name: OP services
masterdata.description: Includes the servies offered inside the OP by the provider (eg. Consultation)

masterdata.name: Daycare services
masterdata.description: Includes the servies offered inside the Daycare by the provider (eg. Dialysis)

masterdata.name: Health check services
masterdata.description: Includes the servies offered inside the Health check by the provider (eg. Complete health check)

masterdata.name: Known Clinical Sepciality
masterdata.description: Includes the clinical speciality for which the provider is known for (eg. Medanta for Cardiac)

masterdata.name: Known Economical Specility
masterdata.description: Includes the economical speciality for which the provider is known for (eg. Aravind eye care for opthamology)

masterdata.name: Specialties available
masterdata.description: Includes the various specialties that are available for a hospital

masterdata.name: Service/ Facilities detail
masterdata.description: Includes the various services/facilities that are available for a hospital

masterdata.name: Equipments category
masterdata.description: Includes the categories under which equipments are listes (eg. Cardiology-ECG)

masterdata.name: Laboratory services
masterdata.description: Includes the Infrastructure under the laboratory services

masterdata.name: Imaging service
masterdata.description: Includes the Infrastructure under the Imaging services

masterdata.name: Bed categories available
masterdata.description: Includes the bed categories available

masterdata.name: Performance parameter
masterdata.description: Includes the performance parameter for a provider

masterdata.name: Computer used
masterdata.description: Includes the services for which computers are used for a provider (eg. Billing)

masterdata.name: Facilities
masterdata.description: Includes the facilities available inside the provider infrastructure (eg. ICUs)

masterdata.name: Facilities available in Operation theater/Area:
masterdata.description: Includes the facilities available inside the Operation theater

masterdata.name: Inhouse service
masterdata.description: Includes the inhouse services of the provider (eg. Laundry)

masterdata.name: Out sourced service
masterdata.description: Includes the outsourced services of the provider (eg. food)

masterdata.name: Hospital areas with back-up facility
masterdata.description: Includes the areas with the power backup facility

masterdata.name: Infrastructure Grading parameter
masterdata.description: Includes the infrastructure parameters to be used for provider scoring and grading

masterdata.name: Accreditation
masterdata.description: Includes the accreditations agencies

masterdata.name: Patient safety measure
masterdata.description: Includes the patient safety measures grading parameters followed by the provider for patient safety

masterdata.name: Quality Maintenance/Quality Check
masterdata.description: Includes the quality maintenance/quality check followed by the provider for patient safety

masterdata.name: Exception Case Approval
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for approving an exception case

masterdata.name: Exception Case Rejection Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for rejecting an exception case

masterdata.name: Exception Case On-Hold Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for putting an exception case on hold

masterdata.name: Empanelment Request Rejection Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for rejecting an empanelment request during tariff negotiation stage or final approval

masterdata.name: Empanelment Request On-Hold Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for putting an empanelment request on hold during final approval

masterdata.name: AMHI Administrative Office Name
masterdata.description: Indicates the various AMHI offices for administrative operations

masterdata.name: Information Category
masterdata.description: Contains the categories of information for which an update request can be received

masterdata.name: Provider information update request rejection Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for rejecting an exception case

masterdata.name: Provider information update request on-hold Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for putting an exception case on hold

masterdata.name: Network Type
masterdata.description: Contains list of types of network that can be created

masterdata.name: Services Provided
masterdata.description: List of the main services that are available for the network in consideration

masterdata.name: Geography
masterdata.description: Indicates the region/geography of the providers which are a part of the network

masterdata.name: Network creation & modification request closed Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for closing a network creation or network modification request during first level of approval

masterdata.name: Network creation & modification request Rejected Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for rejecting a network creation or network modification request during first final approval

masterdata.name: Network creation & modification request On-Hold Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for putting a network creation or network modification request on hold during first final approval

masterdata.name: Reason for status change / tagging
masterdata.description: Indicates reason for changing the status or tagging a provider

masterdata.name: Status change/tagging request rejection Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for rejecting a provider status change / tagging request during approval

masterdata.name: Status change/tagging request On Hold Reason
masterdata.description: Contains the list of reasons for putting a provider status change / tagging request on hold during approval
